thread.title: Volkswagen, Glencore Troubles Unsettle Bond Investors
thread.title_full: Volkswagen, Glencore Troubles Unsettle Bond Investors - WSJ

author: Christopher Whittall
title: Volkswagen, Glencore Troubles Unsettle Bond Investors
text:
September proved one of the worst months for Europeâ€™s corporate bond market in years, as a sharp selloff in bonds of Volkswagen AG and Glencore PLC reminded investors that even the biggest bluechips can run into trouble.
The extra yield investors demand to hold European corporate debt over government bonds has jumped to its widest level since October 2012 as bond investors have switched to assets they perceive as less risky,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
